calendrier.name: Suzanne
text: I still have nothing planned.
Looks like I'm going to celebrate Easter alone this yearâ€¦
Or maybe even online via video-chat.

livre1.name: La CovÃ©die humaine - HonorÃ© de Balzac
text: Â« These debris threw a ravishing poetic effect on the canvas,
and dreamy ideas on the spectator's soul.
A poet would have remained here deep in a long melancholy,
admiring chaos filled with harmony, this destruction that was not without grace.Â Â»

livre2.name: Les MisÃ©rables - Victor Hugo
text: Â«Â Noble and mysterious triumphs which no eye beholds,
which are requited with no renown, which are saluted with no trumpet blast.
Life, misfortune, isolation, abandonment, poverty, are the fields of battle which have their heroes;
obscure heroes, who are, sometimes, grander than the heroes who win renown. Â»

livre3.name: Les MÃ©tamorphoses - Covide
text: Â«Â I would tell you that, in the entire universe, nothing lasts.
Everything crumbles, and beings only take on a fleeting form.Â Â»

radio.name: Radio
text: What should I do?
Listen to music
Listen to the news

news.name: Radio
text: ðŸ”ˆÂ 27th april - Reopening of hair salons,
hardware and gardining stores.

bleiben.name: Radio
text: ðŸŽ¶ Jazz Radio, confinement edition ðŸŽ¶

hint.name: Suzanne
text: Ah, I wonder if Gertrude heard the news.
She's been waiting for that for quite some time now!
And I should call my daughter to see if she ordered me some food.

telephone.name: Suzanne
text: Hmmm, who could I call?
FranÃ§oise (friend)
Sophie (daughter)
Gertrude (amie)

francoise.name: FranÃ§oise
text: Hello? Ah, hi Suzanne! How are you?
Still the same.
Nothing new.
Have you heard the news?

cava.name: FranÃ§oise
text: What have you been doing to pass the time lately
Reading mostly.
I've been listening to the radio.
I've been makin a lot of phone calls.

lire.name: FranÃ§oise
text: What are you reading?
La ComÃ©die Humaine by Balzac
Les MisÃ©rables by Victor Hugo
Les MÃ©tamorphose by Ovide

appel.name: FranÃ§oise
text: Hahaha, I should be doing the same.
Yes!

ennuie.name: FranÃ§oise
text: Likewise. I've been rereading all of my books!
I'm so bored that I've started talking to my plants.
Thankefully you called!
Ah yes, I completely understand! I've been chatting a lot with my cat, Caramel.
choices.preview: Ah yes, I completely understand! I chat with my cat, Caramel.

text: Ah yes, I need some new books as well.
choices.preview: Ah yes, I need some new books as well.

nouvelles.name: FranÃ§oise
text: Ah yes, they are finally reonping the gardening stores.
I really need some fertilizer.
And the hair salons too!
You'll soon be living in a jungle with all of those plants!
choices.preview: You'll soon be living in a jungle with all of those plants!

pandemie.name: FranÃ§oise
text: I my solution tp bring the outdoors into my home!
Oui oui

oui.name: FranÃ§oise
text: I've honestly almost had it with all of this.
I can't stand staying at home all of the time.
We could always go on a walk if you want.
Would you like to stop by my house for a cup of tea?
choices.preview: Would you like to come have tea?

malade.name: FranÃ§oise
text: Yes, that would do me a great deal of good!
Yes me too! See you later!
choices.preview: Yes me too! See you later!

sophie.name: Sophie
text: Hello Mom?
Hi!
Hi Sophie!

zoom.name: Sophie
text: You wouldn't believe what Max did the other day!
That doesn't sound good...
Oh dear, what has he done this time?
choices.preview: What has he done this time?

conference.name: Sophie
text: He came into his fathers office completely naked, while his father was in the middle of a conference call!
Oh, that child is unbelievable!
That doesn't suprise me coming from him!
Oh no!

manque.name: Sophie
text: They don't know what to make up anymore...
They can't stop asking when they'll be able to see you again.
They miss you a lot.
I miss them too. Let them know I said hi!
choices.preview: I miss them too. Let them know I said hi!

bisous.name: Sophie
text: Yeas, and we can do another video call soon!
On an other note, I don't think that I'll be able to order your groceries this week.
The delivery waiting line is just too long.
Do you think you can ask someone to go grocery shooping for you? Maybe a neighbour or something?
I really don't want you grocery shopping yourself, it's too dangerous!
OK, I'll go ask the neighbor then.
choices.preview: OK, I'll go ask the neighbor then.

fin.name: Sophie
text: Great! Well, I have to go, the little ones are being a bit TOO quiet.
I think that they're up to something.
Ok, say hi to the whole family for me!
choices.preview: Ok, say hi to the whole family for me!

gertrude.name: Gertrude
text: Hello?
Hey Gertrude! How are you?

coiffeur.name: Gertrude
text: Yes, did you hear that the hairdressors are going to reopen on the 27th of April?
Already sick of your grey roots?
choices.preview: Already sick of your grey roots?

text: Yes I heard, but I actually enjoy having longer hair in the end.
choices.preview: Yes I heard, but I actually enjoy having longer hair in the end.

text: Finally! I can't stand my deformed hair-cut!
choices.preview: Finally! I can't stand my deformed hair-cut!

racine.name: Gertrude
text: Ah! I'll soon have the same hair-cut as you!
I at least own up to mine my dear!
I'm sure that it will look marvellous on you!
choices.preview: I'm sure that it will look marvellous on you!

long.name: Gertrude
text: I, personally, can't stand it! I really need to go back!
Don't forget to bring a face-mask, it's mandatory.
choices.preview: Don't forget to bring a face-mask, it's mandatory.

text: Don't forget to cough in your elbow!
choices.preview: Don't forget to cough in your elbow!

enfin.name: Gertrude
text: Haha, don't forget to send me a pic!
In your dreams!
Never!

coupe.name: Gertrude
text: I'm guessing that you're going on your own?
Yes, I rescheduled my previous appointment.
choices.preview: Yes, I rescheduled my previous appointment.

text: No, it's still too risky.

byeYes.name: Gertrude
text: Ok, take care of yourself! I have to go! See you soon!

byeNo.name: Gertrude
text: Ok, take care of yourself! I have to go! See you soon!
